name: Dana's Parmesan Deviled Chicken
ingredients: 1/4 cup spicy brown or Dijon mustard
3/4 cup parmesan cheese, the kind in a green can (3 ounces)
8 chicken thighs, bone-in and skin on

instructions.en: Combine oil and minced garlic in a pie plate. Let stand about 5 minutes.
Add mustard and wine to the oil mixture.
In another pie plate, mix parmesan cheese, paprika, and cayenne.
Coat chicken with mustard mixture, then coat well with parmesan cheese mixture on all sides.
Place chicken in a non-stick foil-lined 9x13" baking pan. Sprinkle any remaining parmesan cheese mixture over each piece.
Bake at 350ยบ for 75-90 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and coating is golden brown.

notes: Makes 8 servings. Can be frozen but coating will turn soft. Original recipe calls for bone-in thighs, but boneless thighs can be used (cooking time may reduce to 60 minutes). Spicy brown mustard was used in this version.
